section.title: non-ASCII characters in application with i18n
Description
section.para: An application with i18n does not work correctly due to the validation error that occurs when non-ASCII characters are used.

section.title: How to reproduce
section.programlisting: ... <select id="j_id27:cbxUser" name="j_id27:cbxUser" size="1" style="width:120px"> <option value="Al Korbeli& #269;o">Al Korbeli& #269;o</option> <option value="Al Nagyov& aacute;">Al Nagyov& aacute;</option> <option value="Al Tothov& aacute;">Al Tothov& aacute;</option> <option value="An Gajdov& aacute;">An Gajdov& aacute;</option> ... </select> ...

section.title: Causes
section.para: Bug is caused by the<rich:fileUpload> component

section.title: Workarounds
section.para: You need to update to RichFaces 3.2.0 SP1
